title: The Very Best
body:
I already have an Eglantyne rose in my front garden and am just buying another for the back.
It is a beautiful shade of pale pink and has the sharpest, strongest fragrance I have ever found in any flower - rose or otherwise. 
It's gorgeous!

title: An Absolute Stunner of a Rose
body: I adore this gorgeous rose. Gorgeous blooms held aloft of glossy green foliage, the most beautiful pink and so reliable.  I think this will be one of my all time favourites.
